snippet.title: Poker Chase Gameplay (Android/IOS)
snippet.description:
Poker Chase Gameplay (Android/IOS)
Poker Chase Gameplay [JP]
ポーカーチェイス

Poker Chase GAME
Batrois online poker!

“Change is inevitable, change is immutable.”
The line between the Internet and the real world has become ambiguous
It also obscured the borders and broke even the language barrier.
These changes in the environment have changed people's lives, changed their values, and created a new economic zone.

And now, with the speculation of many companies "sponsors",
The pride of the athlete "player" is mixed,
The enthusiasm of the masses is directed here at "Poker Chase."
Entrust belief, deception and pride to just two cards
In search of a single winner's seat, the player still throws himself into the quantum crucible today.

■ What is Poker Chase?
Two cards dealt to the player and five common cards (community cards) added to the table
Make a hand using a total of 7 to 5 cards,
This is a "Batrois-style online poker game" that uses Texas Hold'em poker, where the outcome is determined by the strength of the role.

In addition, the unique and attractive characters that appear are
Playing poker can increase your liking,
If it exceeds a certain level of liking, it will "evolve" and change its appearance, etc.
New character voices and stamps that can be used in the game will be released.

■ Attractive characters by gorgeous cast and illustrators!

Sayuki Kira (Sayuki Kira)
CV: Mayu Sagara / Illustration: Nezumidoshi

MEI²
CV: Miku Ito / Illustration: Fuumi

Doctor Marine
CV: Ai Kakuma / Illustration: yaman **

Sister Rain
CV: Chinatsu Akasaki / Illustration: yaman **

Christian Black [Before and after evolution]
CV: [Before evolution] Daisuke Namikawa [After evolution] Natsuki Hanae / Illustration: lack

James Sandman
CV: Takaya Kuroda / Illustration: Case Wabe

Furuya Jion
CV: Shiki Aoki / Illustration: Nilitsu

Koharu Kato
CV: Mai Fuchigami / Illustration: Mafuyu

Tracy Resner
★ Scheduled to appear in additional updates!
CV: Atsumi Tanezaki / Illustration: Uiri

Ryoji Ogami
★ Scheduled to appear in additional updates!
CV: Shintaro Asanuma / Illustration: Kuniharu Komiya

Total Size: 334MB
Game Download: 
Playstore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.cbet.pokerChase
AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/jp/app/id1549646582
APK: https://apkcombo.com/pokacheisu/jp.co.cbet.pokerChase/

SUBSCRIBE: @7LGAMEPLAY 

Follow me on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/7lgameplay
Twitter: https://twitter.com/7l_gameplay
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/7lgameplay/

SUBSCRIBE for more videos 👌
Thanks for watching ✌️

#ポーカーチェイス
